resume_professionnel: I am seeking the challenging position with a technology company that will allow me to apply and enhance my skills of being Test Engineer to their fullest potential. Possessing over 10 years of experience in the electronics manufacturing and test engineering environment can bring high level of responsibility and technical role in your company. In addition, I am eager to contribute my creativity and hard work towards the success of your company and to the growth of the fast developing field.
competences_techniques: ECO, ECN, Deviations, SPIs, ETN rework
Lean manufacturing tools (5S, Kaizen, QRQC, Kanban, Takt Time)
RMA / FA systems and failure analysis
WAN optimization appliances (Riverbed Steelhead, Sturgeons, Interceptors)
competences_transversales: Preparation and development of test process procedures

missions: Perform component debugging on complex Android mobile technology products with Android Debug commands.
Bring up and maintain ongoing reliability lab for Android device compliance testing including tumble test, drop test, button cycling test, thermal testing and humidity environment testing.
Troubleshoot and perform final root cause failure analysis on component level for Riverbed Steelhead, Sturgeons, and Interceptors WAN optimization hardware appliances.
Perform functional tests and system level validation; report directly to the customer's quality engineering department with final failure analysis data results on RMA/FA systems.
Manage RMA returns and process orders; perform incoming quality check on RMA systems.
Upgrade firmware or software when required.
Use test equipment tools (digital/analog meters, signal generators, oscilloscope Tektronix TDS 3052, Fluke 26III True RMS MM meter) to find root cause on electrical circuits.
Use TestExpert CAD for signal view.
Directly work with customer's engineers to resolve all test related issues and act as primary technical customer interface.
Prepare and develop test process procedures and disseminate test-engineering standards for developed test systems.
Measure and control test debug WIP.
Design, develop, maintain test procedures and tester software for electronic circuit board production.
Support junior technicians with failure analysis, tester debugging, and reduction of intermittent failures.
Review test equipment designs, data and RMA issues with customers regularly.
Support backend production floor with BOM breakdown for Intel X-86 server platform; create Visual Aids and work instructions for assemblies from frontend to backend.
Implement ECO, ECN, Deviations, SPIs and ETN rework on the production floor.
Design barcode labels with Loftware design software for assemblies and subassemblies.
Create MES routes for assemblies and controlled process verification in the MES system.

Participate in Lean manufacturing (5S, Kaizen Blitz/Events, QRQC, Workflow Analysis, layouts & workcell design, Kanban, simulated continuous flow, debottlenecking, Takt Time) and produce FPY and Test Debug WIP reports.
Applied Lean Six Sigma methodologies to improve production process.
Work with Test and Manufacturing engineering departments for DFT and develop test programs.

Extensive experience in NPI environment and NPI process improvements; worked on customer NPI projects including McAfee, Riverbed, HP, Silverspring networks, NEC, Cisco, Pocketfinder, Sunpower & Sable networks.
Travel domestically and overseas to coach diagnostic technicians for new and existing customer product lines.
Create proposals and design Security Access Control, CCTV Surveillance System and Alarm Systems for government, commercial, and residential customers.
Provide technical support to field technicians and customers.
Install GPS tracking devices on fleet vehicles.
Work directly with the company's Vice President of Engineering on development of alarm verification VIT system.
Support development of new production and R&D engineering departments overseas with BOM breakdown, Visual Aids, schematics improvements and US FCC compliance requirements.
Perform test and troubleshoot CCTV security products on a daily basis.
Perform electrical conformance testing with Agilent 83480A Digital Communication Analyzer.
Introduce new product lines to the customer and marketing department.
Provide technical support on all company products via phone and email.
Test and troubleshoot flat touch screens and report daily test reports to engineering department.
Train new employees to perform tasks on assembly lines.
Certified WWOPS Final Analysis Manufactured Training.
Test and debug all SUNFIRE mid and high series servers.
Generate daily work reports on failed CPU boards and other components.
Work in assembly line, kitting and pack out.
Assist manufacturing engineers to install and test new features on servers.
Interpret and reference SUN Microsystems technical documentation on Netscape intranet.
Work directly with engineers on new customer products for telecommunication servers.
Perform test and repair of bad main boards; work on SMT machines in production.

formations.ecole: Heald College School of Technology, City, State
